      • activatePage

        public SiteAdminGrid activatePage(String title)
        Activates the page by clicking 'Activate' button in the Action Bar. It checks if an Activate References window pops up - in that case the window is confirmed. Waits for the 'Activated' status.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page to be activated
        Returns:
        This SiteadminGrid

      • deactivatePage

        public SiteAdminGrid deactivatePage(String title)
        Deactivates the page by clicking 'Deactivate' button in the Action Bar confirming deactivation on confirmation window.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page to be activated
        Returns:
        This SiteadminGrid
